text: 14|44|Va [ej pajomʙar] mardumro az ruze ʙitarson, ki azoʙi ilohi ʙa suroƣason meojad, pas, onon, ki [ʙo kufru sirk ʙa xes] sitam kardaand, megujand: «Parvardigoro, andake ʙa mo muhlat ʙideh, to [ʙa dunjo ʙozgardem va] da'vatatro posux guem va az pajomʙaron pajravi kunem. [Gufta savad] «Sumo naʙuded, ki pestar savgand mexurded, ki sumoro fanoe nest»
